TopicTitle: What should I do after landing and returning Kerbals from Jool?

Articles.Content:
I have already gone to Eve, Gilly, Kerbin's moons, Duna, Ike and now I just finished my first Jool mission. What should I do now?

When I say Jool mission, I mean exploring some of Jools moons.

Thanks!

Edited March 9, 2023 by american_explorerKSP

How about sending a Kerbal to the deeps of Jool to collect some science (if there's any there) and bring them back alive?

You will need a base on one of the Jool's moons to mine ore and convert it into Fuel. And probably a Space Station orbiting Jool to serve as start/end point to the missions. And resupply missions between them.

You will need to start humble - just skin the Jool's surface then get out, as you need to learn how much deltaV you are going to have in the vessel's budget. Not to mention thermals.

Disclaimer: I never managed to get out of Jool.

Edited March 9, 2023 by Lisias
Better grammars

Alright, I'll try that. Thanks!

Edited March 9, 2023 by american_explorerKSP
Moho is hard to get to due to its orbital speed and inclination. You could try to intercept it.
Alright. Building a Moho probe right now! Thanks!
